name: Spreadr Woocommerce Plugin – Amazon Importer for Dropshipping and Affiliate
author: spreadr

sections.description:
Spreadr plugin helps merchants import Amazon products to WooCommerce stores and earn affiliate commissions or run your dropshipping business.

Easily import products

Find products from Amazon and import them to your WooCommerce store in just a few clicks. Expand with hundreds of new products within minutes. Amazon AWS keys not required to get started.

Hassle-free new income

Earn money when someone buys a product. Amazon manages shipping, returns, inventory and customer support. Effortless new revenue for you.

Increase your influence

Curate products that complement your brand or grow completely new categories to appeal to wider audiences. Become bigger and more valuable.

How it Works

Fast and simple
1. Import any product from Amazon to your Woocomemrce store in 1-click. AWS keys not required to get started.
2. Your visitors can view and buy the products. Orders get fulfilled by Amazon.
3. Amazon pays you commission for each sale. Signup for Amazon Affiliate Program – its free. You can track orders and commissions in the dashboard.

Expand your store with products you never had

Choose from over a million products available on Amazon to add to your product catalog. Add products which complement your store and align with your brand. Make it bigger and more valuable.

Curate products and showcase your taste

Curate tasteful products to give your audience a new reason to come back.

More products – more pages – more traffic

You can modify title and description of the products imported to your store. More pages with optimized descriptions lead to better SEO and increase in organic traffic.

Hassle-free new revenue stream =
While Amazon manages inventory, customer support and shipping, you get up to 10% as commission from all qualifying purchases.

Dropshipping business with Amazon

Alternative to affiliate income, you can use Spreadr to make Amazon as the drop-shipping source. Instead of linking out to Amazon, you can collect orders on your Woocommerce store and later fulfill them yourself.

Reach new audiences

Add new product categories that complement your brand. Appeal to wider audience and monetize your influence.

Features

Simple yet Powerful

  1. Fast & Easy Product Import – Just provide the Amazon product link & click Add. We use official Amazon API to pull product info.
  2. Consistent Store UI – Amazon products will be displayed in same look and feel of your store. ‘Add to cart’ button will be replaced with ‘View on Amazon’ button.
  3. Customize product name, description, and other details after importing the products.
  4. Keep 100% of Your Commissions.
  5. Auto-update – App auto updates price & availability values of imported products to match Amazon so that your inventory and prices are up to date.
  6. Uninstall proof – Even if you remove the plugin, imported products continue to link to Amazon helping you earn commissions.
  7. Bulk-import – Provide a list of Amazon products and get them imported all at once.
  8. Many more features – Auto-tags, Geo-localize, Markup Pricing, Currency conversion etc.

Disclaimers

  1. Our service is independent and is not affiliated with Amazon in any way, shape or form. Any impression you might have got otherwise is inaccurate.
  2. It is your responsibility to ensure that you comply with Amazon’s T&C. While we try our best to ensure the service complies with Amazon Associate terms, you should do your independent validation and use the service only if you are satisfied.
  3. This is a free plugin. It acts as an interface to Spreadr service.

Note

By installing this plugin you agree to accept Spreadr’s Terms of Use.
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information on Spreadr?

You can find out more on our site and you can find answers to many frequently asked questions on our helpdesk portal.

How much does it cost?

Spreadr plugin is free to download and install. However, you require a paid subscription to the Spreadr service. Pricing Plans available here.

1. Provide Amazon URL

  2. Product Imported

  3. Product Displayed on WooCommerce store

  4. Amazon Page with Affiliate Tag

  5. Settings Page
sections.reviews:
spammy and scammy

By dtayl20 on April 27, 2022

The moment I activated this, I received an email from them. Somehow they took my email address without my permission and started emailing me! To make it worse, I head over to their dashboard and they had my name as well! How on earth does this meet privacy requirements?? Worse still... its a free trial. Even worse than that, I wasn't able to delete the online account that was auto created when I clicked activate. WP need to take serious look at this because if plugin authors are going to run background code to grab details without permission is a very serious issue. How do I know if my email address is going to be sold to other spammers?? Very creepy, spammy and scammy. STAY AWAY!

Doesn't mention "Free Trial" until you install it

By Dave Tavres (DaveTavres) on March 13, 2022

Probably a good plugin, but it does NOT mention that it's a FREE TRIAL for a paid service.

False

By thehorsebc on November 19, 2021

Usually don't leave many reviews, but just had to share so no one else wastes their time. Installing the app and setting up is very easy to do. But that's all. First off it is free only for 7 days, that should be listed somewhere that it is not a free plugin or it shouldn't be listed on the .org. After seeing that it's not free still decided to test it out. Secondly it is simple enough to import a product ... just find a product, copy the link, paste it and it is better than some others that it pulls in info, adds the price and has a button. So 1 star for that ... at least was able to import one product. On the second day of trying to import products every link has an error message "Product could not be added. Please check if it is valid Amazon product page." That's every single product tested. Seems they don't respond to the support forum for the app on Wordpress. So won't waste time there. I think the worst for this is that on other platforms their plug works and they offer support. To bad they don't do the same here. Hopefully at some point they will either realize that there is a support forum here or the plugin will be removed.

It doesn't work.

By ponml on August 29, 2021

I'm so angry that I only paid money and couldn't get the service. Among them, the most annoying thing is that spreadr continues to neglect the problem without solving it. If I raise an issue, spreadr doesn't help me forward. This is the worst plugin ever.

Not working

By Tanmoy (tanmoykumarshapu) on November 8, 2020

Not working...

BS!!! This Plugin is Not FREE!!!

By randolf.m on May 26, 2020

This plugin is only a free trial for 7 days, after that you have to buy it. (Free trial ending in 7 days) In addition, the plugin sends your email address to [ link deleted ] without your permission. You will receive a thank you email shortly afterwards. In addition, the plug-in connects to [ link also deleted ] without your consent and automatically creates a user account there. The import of Amazon items (Germany) didn't work either. Conclusion: a plugin you don't need !!!

The first experience is very good.

By mane619 on April 27, 2020

It has everything in one, fast, intelligent, intuitive, very easy to export all kinds of products. Works very well importing the information from any site. Best plugin, I can finally fit top brands into my store that already have an established circle of likes. Easy to handle. I am very happy. Thank you, guys keep us the good work.

The best importer i have ever seen

By lalit18 on April 27, 2020

Superb functionality. Set up in seconds, delivered exactly what I needed. Simple to use product importer Great support provides by spreadr team. Keep the good work !

Best Plugin!!!

By ankit01 on April 27, 2020

I started to use the plugin, so far so good. I really like the speed. As an Amazon Affiliate, this is making my work much easier. The customer support team is awesome! they answer your tickets right away.

short_description: Spreadr enables WooCommerce merchants to find and sell products from Amazon. To learn more about Spreadr, visit https://spreadr.co/woocommerce
